message-1.author: abc@example.com
message-1.text: great job guarding the goal, Kevin!

message-2.author: abc@example.com
message-2.text: oh god, a pack of bears have entered the field!

message-3.author: def@example.com
message-3.text: hurry! we have to open the gate to let the children out!

message-4.author: abc@example.com
message-4.text: no! the bears could get out too and become a hazard to Chicago, we have to hold them inside

message-6.author: abc@example.com
message-6.text: its the law of nature, survival of the fittest, hopefully the bears are not too hungry...

message-7.author: def@example.com
message-7.text: oh no! they got Kevin, motherfuckers!
